ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION_ONE: I'm a Full Stack Developer with more than 5 years of experience in the IT sector. I have worked in different projects and technologies, from web development to mobile development, always looking for the best solution to the problem. I am a proactive person, with a great capacity for learning and adaptation, and I like to work in a team. I am passionate about technology and I am always looking for new challenges.
ABOUT_ME.PHRASE: Focus on creating maintainable and clean code
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION_TWO: I like working with agile methodologies, like Scrum, and with tools like Jira, Git, Bitbucket, etc. I also like to work with good development practices, such as TDD, SOLID, DRY, KISS, etc. and with continuous integration tools such as Jenkins, SonarQube, etc.
